title: GENERIKA type release announcement
content:
I would like to announce the inital release of Generika at DGV.

Generika is a contemporary, rounded typewriter-style typeface in light, regular and bold including theire italics.  
A monospaced version is coming soon.

For more information please visit the DGV-Website:  
( [http://www.die-gestalten.de/fonts/detail/?id=ceaea76518bcb45f0118f02f39a...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015031136/http:/www.die-gestalten.de/fonts/detail/?id=ceaea76518bcb45f0118f02f39af0036#moreinfo "http://www.die-gestalten.de/fonts/detail/?id=ceaea76518bcb45f0118f02f39af0036#moreinfo"))

as I'm quite new to that business comments are verry welcom

kind regards,  
Alexander Meyer  
xyz.ch

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015031136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Generika_Typophile_Specimen_4858.jpg)
author: xyz.ch

comments.content: Cool! The kerning is made to read. André
